Commander: gdkmini file manager

Operating instructions:

D-pad Mobile

L / R page up / page down

A when selecting a directory: open

When a file is selected: view or open

B return to parent directory / exit

Y system options:

-Select all items

-Select an item

-New folder

-View disk information

-Exit program

X select one or more files:

-Copy files are distinguished by the < or > sign

-Move files to the left and right with the < or > sign

-Rename (displayed only when 1 item is selected)

-Delete

-View disk usage

Select the highlighted item.

The selected items are displayed in red.

Start opening the highlighted directory in the target panel.

If the file is highlighted, open the current directory in the target panel.
